target: TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_A1_000_002<tab>イルサバード派遣団について

source: TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_000<tab>Nothing is more important to a pugilist than stamina. And how does one attain such a thing? By eating well, sleeping well, and training well!
target:
TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_000格闘士たるもの、スタミナは大事よ！
ご飯いっぱい食べて、よく寝て、日々精進しなきゃね！

source: TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_010<tab>The path of the pugilist is paved in punishing practices, in exercises that fortify not only the body, but the mind as well. Arduous? Yes. But together, we will reach the end of this long, challenging road.
target:
TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_010格闘士の道は、鍛錬有るのみっ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>、一緒に頑張りましょうね♪

source: TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_020<tab>The Pugilists' Guild has seen a great influx of members as of late. I assume you've something to do with that?
target:
TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_020おかげさまで、格闘士ギルドへの、
入門希望者も、順調に増え続けているのよ！

source: TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_021<tab>As for myself, well, time is hardly on my side. Every day is a blur of new recruits and all the training that entails. Though once I've whipped them into shape, I think I might travel a bit.
target:
TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_021私はと言えば、新人指導に大忙しよ。
もう少し、下の子が育ってきたら、
私自身のやりたいことも始められると思うんだけどね。

source: TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_022<tab>I've still so much to see of the world, so much more yet to learn. The experience I gained with the contingent feels almost wasted here. But out there in the wider world, it could be of real use to people. I could offer help to those in need!
target:
TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_022私ね、派遣団で戦った経験を活かして、
いつか、各地を巡る武者修行の旅に出たいのよ。
あなたみたいに、困っている人を助けながらね。

source: TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_023<tab>Oh, but don't mention this to anyone else, I beg you. I haven't told a soul yet. After all, I wouldn't dare leave the guild now, not when things are still so hectic.
target:
TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_023あっ、このことは師匠には話してないから、
ここだけの話にしておいてね……！
今はギルドで手一杯、当分先になるでしょうから！

source: TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_100<tab>Yes, the contingent is still taking up an ample amount of my time, but I must see to the guild's needs, too, whenever I am able.
target:
TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_100派遣団の任務はもちろんだけど、
合間を縫って、ギルドの仕事もこなさないとね！

source: TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_101<tab>I confess, I saw myself in a different, not-entirely-flattering light next to all those great warriors. I felt entirely unblooded, undertrained in every aspect...though I'm determined for that to no longer be the case. I will grow stronger─as strong as those I fought alongside.
target:
TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_101……他国の精鋭たちのなかに身を置くと、
自分の未熟さを、嫌というほど実感するわ。
もっともっと、強くならなくっちゃ……！

source: TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_110<tab>What a journey it's been, I must say. After we parted with you and yours at the Enceladeum, we had ourselves a scuffle with some of the tempered.
target:
TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_110イルサバード派遣団、おつかれさま！
魔導工廠で)) (( )) 02 /var>たちと別れたあと、
私たちもあの場で、テンパードたちと戦ったんだけど……

source: TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_111<tab>But I must say, you were incredible out there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I always knew there was something about you─something special─but seeing it up close and personal like that... Goodness! You truly are the hope of the people.
target:
TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_111)) (( )) 02 /var>はすごいなって、
改めて、心から尊敬しちゃった！
だって、あなたは皆の希望そのものなのよ。

source: TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_112<tab>When I thought I was done for─ When it felt as if I couldn't take a single step more, I could hear your voice telling me to get back up, to fight to the bitter end. You saw me through my darkest moments by giving me hope and courage when I needed it most, and for that I thank you.
target:
TEXT_REGWIL5CHUCHUTO_00770_CHUCHUTO_000_112私も、もう流石にダメかもって思ったときに、
あなたなら、絶対に勝つって信じられたから踏ん張れたの。
勇気と希望をくれて、本当にありがとう！
